Plain JS

No Framework, No Library

What is this?

This is the same todo app built with zero libraries - just plain vanilla JavaScript (written in TypeScript). No reactive primitives, no virtual DOM, just direct DOM manipulation.

Approach

  • Direct DOM - querySelector, createElement, addEventListener
  • Manual Updates - Explicit render calls when state changes
  • No Abstractions - What you write is what runs
  • Zero Dependencies - Nothing to install
  • Full Control - No magic, no surprises

Trade-offs

More verbose than reactive libraries, but also more explicit. You control exactly when and how the DOM updates. Good for learning, small apps, or when you need maximum control.

Try It

Check out the Todo App to see plain JS in action.
